column2: 祭司职恢复

最高祭司职的回归
在君士坦丁大帝将基督教传入罗马之后经历了几个世纪，希腊宗教作为[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的国教回归了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]已下令重建大祭司团。\n\n最高祭司将成为罗马世界的最高宗教权威，n最高祭司长将成为罗马世界的最高宗教权威，从未来军事远征的祝福到贞女及祭司的任命皆由其掌管。这个宗教一度衰落，而如今，回归的帝国罗马信仰即将登上舞台。
喜闻乐见！

A local Augur has come to your court to perform a public Auguria, the ceremony is held in a plain outside the castle walls and while approaching clouds make you worrisome, the Augur will not postpone it. After observing the entrails of many sacrifices, the Augur is about to proclaim the will of the gods when a bolt of lightning strikes him violently!
It seems the gods spoke for themselves
Am I next?

Kick them out!
